document.masterDocTitle: The bees of the genus Colletes Latreille 1802 of the European part of Russia, with keys to species (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae)

Distribution in Russia
(
Fig. 3
a). Pskov Prov., Rostov Prov., Volgograd Prov., Bashkortostan Republic, Orenburg Prov., Sverdlovskaya Prov., Stavropol Terr., Astrakhan Prov., Dagestan Republic, Siberia.

General distribution. Austria , Hungary , Greece , Ukraine , Russia , Georgia , Azerbaijan , Kazakhstan , Kyrgyzstan , Turkmenistan , Tajikistan , Uzbekistan , Iran , Mongolia , China [Beijing, Hebei, Shanxi, Gansu, Inner Mongolia , Heilongjiang, Xinjiang].
